root: ^A big dog scared me to death with its sudden barking from behind a fence. My actions?
^Talk to it gently to try to calm it down

res1: ^The dog's hid away, but I'm sure it's thinking about how to get back at me
^A big dog scared me to death with its sudden barking from behind a fence. I threw a stone at it.
res2: ^The dog jumped over the fence and started chasing me! I'm lucky I run fast
^A big dog scared me to death with its sudden barking from behind a fence. I tried teasing it, but the dog ran after me. I hardly escaped from it.
res3: ^The dog left me alone, but next time it might be barking at me again
^A big dog scared me to death with its sudden barking from behind a fence. I just ignored it.
res4: ^The dog kept barking, but also waving its tail at me. I think I will get some treat for it next time and try to win it over
^A big dog scared me to death with its sudden barking from behind a fence. But I calmed it down with a nice talk. Next time, I will get a treat for the dog to try to win it over.
